name: Broken Perspectives
description:
Broken Perspectives is a visual novel spanning three parallel narratives. Players are able to choose which point of view they want to experience the narrative through, however every narrative is required to experience the full story. Players explore the perspectives of three friends, the relationships that bind them, and their issues that lead to a break up.

Created for IAT 313 Narrative and New Media at SFU

Created by:

  • Jonathan Newman
  • Tianming Liu
  • Cameron Dawson
